description:
A complete beginner level and easy to understand web designer course for absolute beginners. It gives you detailed explanation & practical examples on how to design a website in Photoshop and convert it into HTML & CSS.

I'm designing for the web since 2011 and I'm very excited to teach you how I design and code websites.

What will you exactly learn from this course?

  • Make web designs using Photoshop
  • How to code in HTML
  • How to code in CSS
  • How to convert PSD to HTML & CSS.

Where to go after finishing this course ?

After finishing this course I'll explain what you need to do to get better and better and what you need to have so you can get clients and jobs.
title: PSD to HTML & CSS Made Easy - For Absolute Beginners
